divs: Sighting DetailsI was out having a smoke on my front steep, looking up at the sky and the stars. I then noticed movement of an object moving in a south to north path. I thought it to be a satellite at first. I tracked it as it passed over this lasted for about 8 to ten mins. and then the light just disappeared, I thought that it was odd and maybe just an aircraft and that it had changed direction, but I should have still see the red and green marker lights. If it was a satellite the light should not have been so bright - the light from the object was like looking at head light of a car across a football field, not blinding but bright still - the object did not give me any feeling other than puzzlement of what it was.
Summary: Looked like a satellite moving at mid orbit south to north orbit or lights on a aircraft then disappeared
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Grand Junction
There were no other sightings in Grand Junction on or around March 3rd 2010
